content.detailedDescription: Having researched the ufo phenomena for 52 years, i scan the sky when i go outside at night. i observed a triangular, v shaped object wandering around the sky within a 5 inch box ( holding a ruler at arm's length ). the object appeared as a triangle with a notch at the base making it also resemble a v shape. the structure was internally lit and the surface appeared cotton like with indistinct edges. it started to eject small spheres or orbs that were pinpricks of light to the naked eye. initially, the spheres were coming from the right side of the main object, traveling straight about an inch, before falling downward in a slight curve. some would stop and hover for 15 to 30 seconds before continuing down toward the horizon. i grabbed my 20 million cp double spotlight and followed 15 of them with the beam. two spheres stopped, hovered, and blinked after being hit by the light. 25 minutes into the event, a light appeared out of nowhere to the left and under the primary object and continued to brighten until it was brighter than jupiter. the light dimmed out after 20 seconds and then spheres started being released from the left side of the primary object. i estimate seeing about 45 to 50 spheres before clouds rolled into the area, ending the viewing session. as i recharged the spotlight, i kept checking on the cloud cover until 11pm. the cover was so thick that jupiter could not be seen at that time. about 30 aircraft went over my location during the sighting, but the objects were much higher in the atmosphere and remained unaffected.
content.summary: Observed a triangular/v shaped lit object in nw sky ejecting small lit spheres

content.detailedDescription:
10/18/11 approximately 6pm central time over northern lake county, indiana, south of lake michigan, southeast of chicago.  i was driving and turned north on a road in munster, indiana (white oak ave.) and saw a large object in the sky to the north approx. 35 degrees from the horizon.  object was moving east to west at a moderate pace.  for the apparent size of the object it seemed to be moving too fast for a blimp, but too slow for a plane or helicopter.  also, at this size, if it was a helicopter i would think it was close enough to hear and there was absolutely no sound in the sky whatsoever - no helicopter sounds, no airplane sounds.  also, with midway airport and o'hare airport in chicago, i don't know why there would be a blimp flying at night moving east to west when the prevailing jet stream is west to east. there was also severe weather on the way and the weather at that time was also not very conducive to blimp flying. i've seen blimps, and this was moving to steady and fast for a blimp.  i would say that the object covered about 20 miles east to west in approximately 2 or 3 minutes, judging from the ground where i first saw it to when i couldn't see it anymore as it went west into the south chicago suburbs.

object:  large, dark silver to gun metal gray appearance.  either a cylider, blimp, or disc shape as viewed from the side. i would say viewing distance was 6-8 miles away.  had one large flashing red light on top, and one large flashing red light on bottom, which would alternately flash once each approximately 2 seconds apart from each other.  body of object seemed to be lit in a way that made the top half seem brighter than the bottom half.  the red lights were very large and could be seen very clearly.  these lights were not positioned horizontally as on a plane or helicopter, but rather on top and bottom of the object.  

with the airports and hospitals in this area we are all very familiar with what planes, helicopters, hot air balloons, etc., of all shapes, sizes, and speeds look and sound like.  my first reaction to the look and size of this object was "what the **** is that?!?"  it looked very large and ominous in the sky and did not have the flight speed of a plane or helicopter, nor did it have any sound that one would make if it was flying that slow. there was absolutely no aircraft sound whatsoever. once again, i've seen blimps and it was moving too fast for a blimp, nor would i think it would be flying at that time considering the weather and time of night.  

i was by myself in the vehicle when i saw this, but when i was able to describe this to my girlfriend a couple of hours later, she posted to her facebook asking if anyone saw anything in the sky that night.  very generic, no description or anything.  she quickly recieved a reply from a friend who saw it when he was in the showplace 16 movie complex parking lot in schererville, indiana at the same time i saw it.  without any prompting he described it in the exact same way i did.

with the very high population of nortwest indiana/south chicagoland area, i can't imagine we were the only two who saw this.  even if it wasn't a "ufo" per se, i just want to know what the heck it was.
content.summary: Blimp or disc shaped object with red flashing lights on top and bottom. larger than helicopter or plane.  silent.

content.detailedDescription:
i was at work at corner of vasser and lomas blvd. by the university of new mexico hospital when (04) jets were heard taking off from the kirtland airforce base. that alerted me that there might be something that could be a threat in the sky,(approximately at 0125hrs.) i went to the mufon.Com and checked for the latest sightings, then saw an airplane flying east above cloud level right above me.  while watching the airplane a vshape object appeared in front of the plane and right under it. vshape object had (05) lights under it. round lights at all (03) points and (02) more in between the three points making a vshape. object appeared above me and travelled southbound for(05) seconds then shot up straight into the moonlit night.  half moon was at my 3 o'clock. airplane travellin from 9 o'clock to 3 o'clock. object went from 12 o'clock to 6 o'clock about 96 degreez south at mach speed. ufo was so close but lights were not bright. i saw the outline of it and the reflection from the lights off the body. appeared and disappeared.  i then saw a medic helicopter hovering around the unmhospital. 
 i saw something of the like back in the early 90's in zuni, nm. total of (04) object going west toward ariz. approximately 1930 hrs. travelling too far to be jets or planes.
content.summary: Watching airplane going east above cloud level, then saw vshape object appear in front of and under airplane. object  travelling south then shot straight up into moonlit night.

content.detailedDescription: I first noticed the object when i was driving home from work at about 430 in the morning. as i was driving i noticed what looked like a very bright star in the sky above and ahead of me. it only caught my attention because while i was driving on a straight road i say the object go horizontal across the sky and then when i pulled into my house i noticed that it had stopped high in the sky right in front of the house but high. i mean i thought it was a star but there were other stars in the sky and this object was much lower and much brighter than those. so to make sure that i was not imagining things, instead of me pulling in to my driveway where i was, i decided to change direction and head toward another location far from me. and i notioced when i did the object was definetly with no doubt following me. and i am for sure this is no normal star that you see in the night sky often. as i moved it followed me, and you could also see it when it changed direction and cut across the sky. to make matters even stranger its been following me for about the last five months, and it mostly happens from about 1100pm to about 700am in the morning.And you can actually see this thing when the sun is starting to rise for the morning, and there is absolutely no stars in the sky when this can be seen. i also notice that during the approaching morning time before it leaves whenever i am driving i see the object but as soon as i stop and face the object it slowly descends into the sky where it can barely be seen, unlike night time when i see it most of the time. i have shown this object that has been followning me to another person and asked them what they thought i should do. the person saw it and believed me, but recommended that i not tell the police about it or they would think that i was crazy. i reported the event to the police anyway and not only did they not believe me but they were very rude about what i had to say and didn't want to listen.
content.summary: Very bright star-like object thats been following me for the last 5 months. changes direction

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend is a wildfire photographer. after we had been together for several weeks and knew i wouldn't laugh, she showed me her ufo photo taken in 2006. 
  while photographing a grass fire east of coalinga ca, she set her camera to auto fire at one frame per second. in one frame, a disc shaped object with a dark circular dot on the underside appears. it does not show in timestamped frames one second before or after.
  this was not noticed until the pictures were viewed later.
  under magnification, the object appears to eclipse a power line behind it!
a calfire official was intrigued enough upon hearing about this photo, he asked for a copy.
  i should note that no aircraft were dispatched on this fire and no other aircraft were observed in the area,
content.summary: Disc object inadvertently captured while photographing a grass fire.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dogs around 8:45 pm. i noticed in my peripheral vision light, when i turned my head i saw a round ball of light right over my head. then it moved forward & disapeared. it wasn't as large as a basketball but it was bigger then a tennis ball. no sound. my dogs didn't bark they were the same. i was surprised how close it came to me? this is the first time i'v seen anything like this ever. i googled round ball of light & the phoenix green orb story from oct 2nd came up so i clicked on mufon & wow this is amazing. i still want to know what is it? i was not harmed but why was it so close to me?
content.summary: Round ball of light

content.detailedDescription: It was white looked like a weird blimp, was flying at a rapid speed then stopped and just sat there pointing kind of upward and then spun around and stayed there for 5-10minutes until we left. it had no blinking lights except for a red light off of its side, it appeared half lit. it looked like it was maybe 50-100 feet long and even when i was close to it within like 200 feet it couldn't really make out what it was, the front was pretty lit, reminded me of a blimp but was emitting to much light and it wasn't moving when i seen it, it was kind of spinning. additional it was night and raining when i had seen this. at first i thought it was the moon it was so bright in the front but was moving rapidly as i stated above. this took place over bloomington illinois.
content.summary: Blimp like object flying over city stops and hovers.

content.detailedDescription:
I came out to give mail to my cousin in law.  he was showing me pictures of his new baby. we were standing on my front poarch he said something about a falling star. i looked up and saw nothing. a few seconds past and i heard the nehibor dogs whine like nothing ive ever heard i took a step foward and looked up agin suddenly a black triangle was right above
us no lights nothing but a black object. i repeatedly asked if he could see it he
said no it moved slightly berig south east it past between two trees i than saw the side 3 orange colored lights than it changed angles i was able to see 2'sides with 3 lights each. it made no noise as it faded into the horizon at great speed. i immeadtly thought a govt drone or military craft i live close to an afb never seen anything like it. i have personally witnessed 3 drones and nothing like it. there was no lights on the bottom at all. there was a strange haze aroung the ship like a magnetic field around it. ive never had this kind of
feeling i've always been able to find a reasonable explantion not. this
time.
content.summary: Black triangular object with 3 lights on two sides moved north to south with no sound right above me

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the backyard hot tub enjoying the evening and gazing at the stars at around 7:40pm. laying back i saw a satellite moving along a s-n trajectory at approximately 70 degrees above the east horizon. i watched it until the satellite was out of view.

after another few minutes(7:50pm) i caught something out of the corner of my eye. looking up, i first thought that it was one of the military fighters that fly over our house occasionally. the manner of flight seemed too slow (floating? effortless?). even though the hot tub was running i did not hear any sound from the object. i then wondered if it were a bird, perhaps an owl.

i then fully recognized the shape as an equilateral triangle with very faint amber colored lights on each of the corners. the corners looked rounded. it seemed as if it were shrouded in a haze or mist. it traveled in a ssw-nne trajectory  at between 80-85 degrees overhead between 300-500 feet elevation. as i watched the object faded and disappeared. the incident lasted around 5 seconds.
content.summary: Equilateral triangle with amber corner lights in henderson, nv.

content.detailedDescription: My sister, her yorkie and i were driving in unknown territory trying to get back to brazil, indiana. our gps told us to go down several gravel roads in the middle of nowhere through carbon, indiana. it instructed us to turn down a gravel road called 100 e where i stopped the car as we turned onto it so my sister's dog could go to the restroom. it was already very dark out and my sister felt very uneasy letting him out of the car. she never got out of the car but put him right outside the vehicle and was hurrying him to go really quickly. when she got him back in the car she told me she was feeling very uneasy and i was too since the road was gravel and in the middle of nowhere. we had seen a sign as we turned onto the road that said "low clearance" and this made us uneasy as well since we weren't exactly sure what it was referring to. we were driving slowly down this gravel road with the brights on so were could see because it was so dark. we were commenting on how creepy the location was i noticed in the distance there was a series of lights that lit up in a sequencial manner which i thought initially was some sort of reflecters on a structure ahead that we couldn't see yet. this drew my attention to the sky where i was seeing faint flashing that was constant. it looked like faint lightening but it was continuous. i asked my sister if she was seeing the flashing lights in the sky and had almost come to a complete stop with the car. she started looking in the sky but couldn't see what i was seeing. we had a map light on in the car that's on the rearview mirror which was inhibiting her from seeing the lights. as she turned off the light she was still not seeing the flashing. i asked her to look where i was pointing to the clearing in the trees and she said, "i don't see the flashing but i do see those lights ahead of us!" that's when i looked forward and saw the lights that i originally thought had been reflecters of some sort. they were extremely bright and appeared to be moving in a pattern that appeared to be going in a circle around an object. in the first few seconds the lights were going in a sequential manner as though they were revolving around the object then they began to blink on and off in random patterns. i had stopped the the car at this point and we sat there staring at the "light show" wondering what in the world they could be. the whole thing looked just like the typical lights on an alien craft thing that you see in the movies or on those videos where people are trying to hoax the public. it was so sterotypical that we were wondering if someone was projecting the lights onto something in the distance that we couldn't see at that time. we kept asking each other what we thought it could be but neither of us said anything about a ufo at first. as we watched the lights i finally asked my sister if she thought we were actually witnessing a ufo to which she responded, "i'm not sure but i was thinking the same thing." we both then started to worry quietly to ourselves about how we really hoped we wouldn't get abducted because we have dogs at home that need us. we never said it outloud but that was what we were both thinking simultaneously. the lights were in a horizontal line and remained that way all the time we were watching them except when they briefly tilted up on one side only for a couple of seconds before going horizontal again. it titled up on the left side as we were looking at it. as we were wondering out loud what we should do because we were both now completely freaked out yet acting calm which i believe was more shock than calm. this was something that we always said we never wanted to see. we both always believed that we weren't alone in the universe but really didn't need to see any ufo's or aliens to confirm it for us. this was in fact one of our biggest fears and it was right there in front of us only several yards in front of us. right after the lights had tilted i reached for my iphone to try to see if i could get a picture of it. my sister had her camera with her and started to get it ready as well. i held up the phone and realized that i couldn't see anything to photograph and as we watched it and wondered what we should do the lights simply blinked out. my sister never had to time to get her camera ready to get any pictures. the whole "show" lasted no more than a few minutes and ended in the blink of an eye. as we debated as to whether or not to drive ahead where the lights had been or turn around, i decided to drive forward. as we neared where the lights had been we were in shock to realize that ahead of us was a tunnel that had a rail road track running across it. it wasn't a large tunnel and only one car could drive through it at a time. we drove very slowly where we saw the lights and realized that no one was around in the woods that surrounded the area and there would have been no way to project a light onto the tunnel and have it look the way it did due to the opening in the tunnel. we didn't stop because we were too scared and stunned by what just happened. as we drove on following the gps's orders we continued to talk about what just happened but we really we both were in shock. we finally got to a road where we saw a cop car drive by and i wondered out loud if we should flag him down to tell him what we saw. my sister was worried the cop would think we were crazy. i finally decided that we had to drive back there to make sure it wasn't something explainable. we were so scared but we knew we had to do it and i think we were really hoping there was a logical explanation for what we just explerienced. when we drove back through the tunnel we stopped and looked around. there was nothing there and no one was around. we just couldn't find any explanation for what we witnessed. i decided to call the local police and tell them what we saw hoping they would give us that logical explanation we were so desperately seeking. the police didn't act like i was a crazy person nor did they act shocked. she told me that the town of carbon had fireworks that night and that could've explained the flashing in the sky but she had no explanation for the lights. i was willing to accept that even though i knew what i saw wasn't from fireworks. she said she would send a policeman out to check it out. as we drove home we were in shock and kept talking about it trying to explain it away unsucessfully. this event has affected us so much and caused bad dreams and big fears daily and nightly. we really feel like we will never be the same again. we have a fear that really affects our lives now. we went back to the site a week later in the daytime to investigate it more thoroughly. my sister climbed up the steep hill to the train track to make sure there wasn't something up there that could have caused it. the lights were hoving in front of the bridge just a few feet off the ground from what we could tell in the darkness. we actually experienced two trains going by there in the daytime and got a chance to hear what they sounded like. there was no sound that night from a train or anything else. there was no sign that it had ever been there. i actually went to the two closest houses to the location and asked them if they had seen or ever seen these kinds of lights. one person was very nice and said that kids party around there but she's never seen any lights and didn't see any that day. the other person acted very stoic and made me feel really stupid asking him those kinds of questions. he said he had never seen anything like that. we left that place way before it got dark and still with no definitive answers to what we experienced. i struggled with whether or not to report this sighting but felt that it might be almost theraputic to go through the whole experience again. this sighting has changed us forever. we are actually afraid to be out in the dark now and my sister is still having bad dreams about the whole thing. we will never be the same again. my sister said it felt as though our innocence had been stolen from us that night and even though i laughed when she said it i think it really is true in a way. i'm hoping that by reporting this that someone else speaks up saying they saw something that night too or maybe gives a logical explanation for what we saw.
content.summary: Ufo sighted on country road in carbon indiana

content.detailedDescription:
This just happened and i must admit i got pretty excited.
around 7:30pm 10/18/11 i was standing on the front steps of my house
when i looked up and something really weird.

i saw this triangular shaped blob moving thru the sky.
at first i thought it was a flock of birds. but it was
moving way too fast. gliding, actually. and then it stopped
and changed directions over my house. it had no lights and no
sound. the edges of it were fuzzy and black and the inner part
was a lighter greyish green. it sort of faded in out out 
of vision like some sort of camouflage or cloaking. 

when it stopped to change directions it seemed like it changed
its shape. the middle got skinny and the sides got wide almost
like an hour glass. i thought for sure it was one of those drones 
i've read about. but it changed its shape again, into a chevron shape and
suddenly what i can only describe as some sort of giant arm unraveled like a snake off the left side of it and then whoosh! it shot out of here
as fast as lightening. i don't know what it was or where it came
from but it was not natural. 

no one else saw it unfortunately. but i'm going to keep 
my eyes open from now on just in case it comes back.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Dark, silent, gliding camouflaged chevron w/ snake like appendage

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to smoke a cigarrete and looked up in the notheast part of sky , sky was clear lots of stars and planes flying to the south and south west ,  looked up to north east sky and saw a small white but very bright light up in the stars, much to far away to be a plane, alos there was no blinking lights and it had a sparadic flight not like a plane it seemed to slow at times then speed up as it went south i yelled to my roomates and said there is something flying up in the stars, they took thier time thinking i was crazy but as soon as i showed the fisrt roomate,  she herself saw what i was seeing a white light moving amoungst the stars, then she went in with me i went back out side and tred to find it in the same area however now it was going back north east i showed my roomates husband the light and he was speechelss , i pointed out the planes flying in same area and their blinking lght and the hight at wich they are flying, i lost sight after it went back north , i saw it fo ra total of 5-7 min wich is a long time to study how it flew, i am certan it was a ufo of some kind, if not any clue to what it was?
content.summary: I went out to smoke a cigarette  looked up in stars and saw one satart to move no bliinking lights moving faster than satalight or plane yet seemed to slow down and then pick ip pace as it went north east to south

content.detailedDescription: I thought it was a plane landin at airport 20mins from my house then it was gone no sound.Then the very bright light was gone.
content.summary: Thought it was a plane landin at airport 20mins from my house then it was gone no sound

content.detailedDescription: Theses photos were taken by my sister who was visiting wisconsin , last month , the photos are taken directly outside my apartment, with a camera phone. she had just finished talking to her husband and was coming back to talk some more to me and our other sister. she told us that she felt compelled to take these photos with in a time lapse of about ten seconds for all three.At the time she took the photos there was nothing visible in the sky to attract her attention to take pictures . as you can see it was a beautiful day . this was not photo shopped or picture manipulation , the images appeared in the photos after she took them. i believe it is an orb., but we donot know exactly how far away , i can honestly say at least a mile or more . i live hear and know the area very well. i went out and tryed photo shooting with my phone and nothing appeared as well as our other sister , nothing appeared on either of our camera phones and it was within 2 to 3 minutes after the event.The time was around 5pm, and after looking at the order of the picture the object is moving from right to left. we saw nothing visible in the sky other than the sun and partial clouds. i and my two sisters do not know what this could be .
content.summary: This object was filmed by my sister after she finished a phone call outside . she was walking back up to my door and said something urged her to take pictures at that time. i need to mention that she saw nothing in the sky pryor to taking the photos.

content.detailedDescription: In a rear lot of a business (located westside of michigan city)i was walking southbound.  i first noticed the blue luminating triangular object which appeared to moderately hover to the southeast.  as the object travelled southwest the shape then seemeed to appear blimplike.  the object's color maintained a glowing blue the entire event.
content.summary: Bright luminating blue, blimp-shaped object  moderately hovering then continued flowing path southwest directional in michigan city, in

content.detailedDescription: Bed asleeo woke up saw 4 round ojects in sky chaseing one another woke up fiansay she saw it we got dressed went outside woke my mother up she is 78 iam 53 my fiansay is 36 we watched this  go on for 4 hours from a distance i have this on my video phone also pictures of this not 4 hours saw it at 4pm to 6;38 pm daylight came they were gone very scary
content.summary: 4 of them

content.detailedDescription: After my running practice at school, i was waiting for my ride home. it was about 4:30pm. i was watching the sky, trying to find something to do while i waited. suddenly, i noticed an object in the sky. i didn't know what it was. it appeared to be an oval or cigar, but based on the distance i could have been a disk. it appeared to be spinning and reflecting the sunlight off its surface. the sunlight prevented me from seeing the actual surface of the craft, but it was a clear day with plenty of sun, so i know i did not imagine the object. after a few minutes, it slowly faded away. after it was gone, i looked to see if anyone else had been watching it. no one else seemed to have noticed, so i kept it to myself, wondering if i had really just seen something supernatural.
content.summary: A cigar shaped metallic craft hovered through the air as i watched.

content.detailedDescription: It all began when i awoke at 4 am needing to go to the bathroom. above the toilet is a window, and that's where i first spotted it from. i watched for a few minutes, thinking it must be an airplane. but it moved up, then down, then up again, and i noticed it looked like it was changing size and shape. i thought, woah this is a ufo. i quickly got my son, who was up playing wow on his computer, and told him to look. he gave it a very quick glance and told me i was nuts. i grabbed his girlfriend and had her look and she was as excited as me. she watched for a couple of minutes, then ran upstairs and got her phone which had a recorder on it. we then proceeded to film this object as it moved, pulsated, changed size and changed colors. it was right above the tree line behind my house. we filmed it until it dropped below the tree line. i have never been so excited. i downloaded the film into a program on my computer, then transferred it to a format for youtube, and uploaded it to my youtube account. i finally got some sleep, and upon wakening, i went to my youtube account to see the film again, and someone had seen the film and uploaded it to ufo-blogger. but they said it was in new york, lol. i had to set them straight on that, since it was in nc. since the, many of my friends said i should report it, so here i am. better late than never i guess.
content.summary: I filmed this ufo that was above my house in nc at 4 am on 9/11/11

content.detailedDescription:
I was the passenger in the vehicle while my girlfriend was driving. we were headed south on 1-91, just outside of hartford, ct. she saw this object as well. 
  at exactly 6:11 ( i had changed the radio right before i noticed the object, so i glanced at the clock) i looked above the city skyline to notice the object in the sky. it was reflecting the setting sun off the top of the disc, and banded around the middle in a horizontal row were five white lights. the object was hovering.
  i thought the object was a helicopter when i first saw it, there are two hospitals in hartford that use lifestar helicopter. however after i watched it for a moment i realized it was not a helicopter. it was not a cloudy day and the air was crisp, there was no haze.
  the object hovered there, and as i commented on it and my girlfriend confirmed what i saw, i looked to the right to see a plane that had taken off and was headed west. bradley airport isn't far from hartford, and the plane sighting confirmed to me what i saw was not a plane. it looked totally different.
  i felt at ease when i saw the object, it just seemed out of place in the sky. i felt fine after, but i feel the need to share the story.
  we passed under an underpass (there are a few as you enter the city on the highway heading south) and when i looked again out the window to try and snap a photo with my phone, the object was gone. it just seemed to have blinked out of existence. we got in the slow lane and i looked out all of the windows, but the object was gone.
content.summary: Cigar/disk shaped with 5 white lights in a row banded around the middle of the object.

content.detailedDescription:
We were camping at springmill state park campground, in the primitive camping area. there were 5 adults 32 to 45 and three children 4, 13 & 16... around 9pm or so on sat the 15th, we were getting ready to have hotdogs around the fire. everyone was pretty busy at the time except for my one buddy bob. he must have been saying "look! what heck is that" many times, because it did not register until he was yelling it and said afterwards "aren't you glad i kept saying it?"

 anyway, by the time i looked up, the object was right above us but to the south about 30 to 40 deg. from center sky... 
 the object was a roundish amber colored orb of light. it was pulsing slightly in an uneven 'electrical pulse' like manor and had a slight wobble to its otherwise straight line trajectory... it was moving west to east and disappeared in the tree line... my other buddy dallas, went to his truck a camp sight over to grab something and came back telling us that it just crossed over going the opposite direction.

when i first look up to the object, i could tell instantly that it was not something normal... personally i was amazed and looking at it intently, trying to notice and take in everything i could. no one else seemed to think much of it other than the 3 of us. but it was gone rather quickly, even though its speed did not seem to be that fast.

again, it was a round amber/orangeish-red glowing like light. but the light was uneven and blured, with a jittery pulse to it. it was on a straight line trajectory but seemed to have a wobble to it. the pulsing along with wobble and uneven light almost gave it a character or personality of sorts. like if it was an entity, it was not felling to well...

i really wish i would seen it track across the sky the opposite direction again.

thanks for taking the info

 jason
content.summary: Glowing amber orb w/ slight wobble over springmill state park

content.detailedDescription: multiple events over a period of time, believed to be caused by contact with aliens.
content.summary: This witness believes that he has had contact with extraterrestrials and as a result has a brain implant.  the telephone number and e-mail address listed are those of vicki leblanc, wi state director who will forward additional information

content.detailedDescription:
October 17, 2011 10:30pm
while sitting on my balcony i saw a fussy gray object silently traveling from south to north in a straight line.  the sky was clear.  there was no reflection of moon light off the object. at first it appeared ghost like.  as it got further to the north i went the balcony railing and noticed the object appeared to elongate into a boomerang  shaped object before going out of sight. the only other moving object was a commercial aircraft in a down leg approach to dia for landing.
content.summary: Gost like blob changing to boomerange in distant

content.detailedDescription: I was out of town, with my 2yr old son, visiting friends in charlotte, nc for the weekend. myself and a friend were leaving another friends house on the northeast side of town, and we were travelling down wt harris blvd. i was driving and my friend was in the backseat with my son and her newborn daughter. i first witnessed two bright orange circular objects, almost fire-like in color and appearance. i saw them in front of the car, flying at the same altitude as several planes that were in the sky at the same time. these objects had no blinking lights and were clearly bright orange orb like objects. when i first spotted them, i pointed them out to my friend in the backseat, and we watched them travel from the front of the car to the left/drivers side of the car in a matter of seconds, while we were stopped at a red light. when the two lights travelled to the left side of the car, i noticed a third light that joined with the other two to form a horizontal formation. two of the lights then moved upward to form a vertical formation in the sky. then the stoplight turned green and so i could no longer observe the objects. i have always loved looking at the stars ever since i was a little girl, and i have never seen anything like this before. in the sky with these objects were several planes, so it seems to me that there should have been multiple witnesses to this event.
content.summary: Three bright orange circular objects in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Through out my life i have witnessed some amazing specticals in the sky, recently i had witnessed one of these strange lights while watching the sky outside regina sk on our farm which i live.  in hopes to capture something on video i sat on our drive way with a camera and a pack of smokes for hours, on numerous occations. to my amazment i was able to get two videos, of what i had seen previous, with in two months of eachother. the second sighting and video is what i am reporting today.  
      while sitting on a lawn chair i noticed to the west of my position, what appeared to be a star. after watching it for a moment i noticed it slowly rise up from its position over regina sk a few degrees.  it then began moving toward my position. as the ball of light became closer it started appearing larger and brighter! once it was directly above me i reclined the lawnchair and took my eye off of it for a second. once i got into a comfortable position i started looking for object which just moved above me, however i could not see it moving and i was looking at a sky full of stars. after pointing my camera directly above my position for about 20-30 seconds, i was sure that what ever it was that came over top of me had vanished literaly in the blink of an eye!  i ran into my house to see if i had got it dissapearing on video and to my amazment it had stopped moving in a south east direction, and was hovering above me for about 5 seconds, then it takes off verticaly and dissapears in a short few seconds out of sight. 
   ever since my last sighting i have almost religiously been searching for more ufos and have seen one since. however,i was not able to capture it on video
 but this video is proof that i did see something strange that night and i know it was out of this world!
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It moved directly above me, stopped for a moment and then took off vertically

content.detailedDescription: I woke up pretty early (between 5:30 am-6 am) and decided to go out for a jog. before doing so i decided to walk my dog for a bit. i did so around 6:30 am when it was still dark but the sun was just starting to rise. as my dog was using the bathroom, i look out into the sky and saw a dark horizontally rectangular object hovering in the sky with three bright lights on it. two lights were yellow, the other was red. the light in the middle was pulsing rapidly. at first i thought it was a plane, but as i keptlooking atit i noticed that it was not moving constantly like a plane does at night. rather it was just hovering there. i leaned over to get a better look as it was pretty far past some trees and i tried to see if maybe it was a tower with lights on it (ie an antennae) but i saw no tower at all connecting to the object. at that point i was pretty sure...It was a ufo. i took my dog back inside, grabbed my camera, and ran to a nearby neighborhood to get a better look. i began to film the object as it stayed hovering in the air for about another 5-10 minutes all the while still pulsing the bright light. after a while i noticed that there was a sound emitting from the object that sounded alot like helicopter blades and so i began to think that maybe the object in the sky was just a helicopter. so i stopped filming, and began to look at the footage i had caught so far. when i looked back in to the sky, the three lights had now transformed into just one bright light, that flew much higher into the sky, and began to fly off. i began filming the object again and at that point i was convinced it was a ufo. because a helicopter would not drastically change light patterns or shoot really high into the sky the way this thing did. and that was that. the ufo flew off and icouldn't follow it because it was really far. amazing experience...
content.summary: Hovered in the sky for about 15-20 minutes then it changed shape and flew off

content.detailedDescription: was outside smoking a cig at 8:00pm when i saw a star like object ascend until it disappeared. it was about the size of a bb held at arms length. it came from the west and kept going up and up and disintergrated into an orange ball. the orange ball also disappeared in less than a second. i see alot of planes because i live about 15 miles from the airport in manitowoc wi. i don't believe this was a plane. i also wonder if this object landed somewhere in the west of my location.
content.summary: Star like object ascends until it disappears

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were intertaining my 4 year old grandson in the backyard laying on a couple of lounge chairs staring up into the dark sky. we told him to be watching for moving stars because those are satellites. we saw a couple of satellites moving north to south, then we saw one moving diagonally from southwest to northeast. haven't seen that before. as i stared straight up all of a sudden a very bright star appeared where there had not been one just to disapear in an instant. like a super nova from a distant galaxy.
i felt assume like i had just witnessed a super nova. my wife and grandson did not see it.
content.summary: While staring straight up in the dark sky i saw a very bright star show where there was none, just to disapear as fast as it appeared.

content.detailedDescription: I take an evening walk on a daily basis when a red light caught my eye. the red light arrived near the hills traveling west. tonight there was no moon here so the stars were very visible.  when i first saw the light i thought it was a chopper because it seemed to hover over the hills.  the county of mendocino has it's fair share of pot gardens so i thought it was a chopper inspecting the hills.  i continued with my walk and noticed a plane on the other side of the valley and compared it to the red light.  i continued to watch the red light and out of nowhere a white light appears near the red light.  the white light takes the lead as they both start to travel south along the hills in unison.  as i watch it looks like both lights are both from one craft.  whatever it was had to be huge.  i would describe it as a flying submarine with the white light as the "headlight" and the red light at the end of the craft.  as it travels the red light spins as if it was a searchlight.  the craft moved slowly and with no noise at all.  i went into my aunts house to make sure she would witness this craft and yes she did see it too.  we watched as it traveled off into the night.  i've seen a lot of strange lights in this area in the past couple of years so it was no surprise that more were to come. no time to get pics or anything but i was glad to not witness it alone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo over the western hills of ukiah ca

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my jeep rubicon after getting  back into the car from academy sports store.  it's a typical suburbia mall (michaels, dollar store, etc...).  it was approx 7:00pm and starting to get dark at this point.  i was looking out of the top/roof of my jeep.  i just got this car & had the "freedom top" removed & i love to look out of it, etc... 

well, i look up & i see what i think to be a bright star and/or planet.  i was about to take out my iphone & use the google star map app to see what it was.  but then, the light started moving about.  it moved slowly at first from a stationary position.  initially, i figured maybe it was an airliner or c-130.  i am in the usaf and so is my husband.  i am a jag and he is a c-130 pilot.  then i thought to myself...That's way too high for a c-130 and a commercial plane would not fly that way.  to be clear, it was very high up.  from my perspective, it looked like a planet.  but, when it moved, it would lurch forward 2 to 3 inches (so imagine you are looking at a star & it just moves 3 inches forward in the sky....But in actuality it is obviously a large distance).  the light would take a zig zag type path; pause, and then move in an "l" pattern, pause, and then continue to move in random patterns.  i watched it for a good 25-30 minutes.  it was directly above my head so it started to hurt my neck after so long!  i called my husband of course telling him what i saw.  he said he recently saw a weather balloon while flying and it could be a weather balloon b/c the wind could move it in a certain way. i told him no - this was not simply b/c of the distance the object moved.

i took pictures of it with my iphone.  i had to zoom all the way in & then take the pictures.  of course they are not very good b/c of the quality.  i tried to take a video but i could not zoom with the video feature.

i wanted to let you guys know & see if anyone else reported anything similar? thanks for taking the time to read this & please don't hesitate to contact me if you need any more info.

please note:  the pictures are horrible quality.  i had to zoom the cell phone to the max & it was still hard to see the object.  i can attach them but it's hard to see it.

thanks.
content.summary: The light moved errratically & then would stop for 2 minutes & then would move about again in random patterns.
